item.description: About I am Mardin Nasouti. Computer science student Believe in Nothing (Existential Nihilism) An ocean one meter but with a few trench Research on reverse engineering of Linux, browsers and ARM. Amateur study in Philosophy,Theology,Politics and Diplomacy,Ethic,Law,History,Psychology,Neuroscience,Sociology,Biology,Physics, Mathematical Analysis and all branch of science and engineering. In this blog I write about my experiences,research and review of books(goodreads profile) that I have read.
